rows.label: qst002208_msg0001
rows.name: I... I lost...?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0003
rows.name:
What am I supposed to do now...?
I... I have to get into the
Choir no matter what...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0004
rows.name:
I can't take this life anymore... If
only you weren't here, I'd be...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0005
rows.name:
...Albina-san, I don't know what
circumstances you've been through.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0006
rows.name:
But to try and join the Choir
just for a wealthy life...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0007
rows.name:
Don't you think Marveni-sama
would dislike having someone
with such thoughts in the Choir?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0008
rows.name:
What's that...? Are you
saying I'm wrong...?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0009
rows.name:
You're saying it's my
fault I didn't get into
the Choir, is that it...?

rows.label: qst002208_msg0010
rows.name: ...Yes, that's what I think.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0011
rows.name:
Just because you got in...
you're so arrogant...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0012
rows.name:
N-no, I'm not trying to be
arrogant, it's just...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0013
rows.name:
...Go on, say it. Give me
a reason I can accept...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0014
rows.name:
I... I believe that the
Choir isn't just about
making the singers wealthy...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0015
rows.name:
I think that the songs enrich
the hearts of those who listen,
and our own hearts as well.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0016
rows.name:
And that those songs are
prayers for others, sung
with the listeners in mind...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0017
rows.name:
That's why they can reach
people's hearts...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm sure that if you sing
thinking only of yourself,
your song won't reach anyone...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0019
rows.name:
So, um, well... I don't
know how to say it...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0020
rows.name: ...That's a sound argument.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0021
rows.name: ...Mellica... I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0022
rows.name:
Ah, no, I'm the one who should be
sorry. I was being so arrogant...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0023
rows.name: I love singing too...

rows.label: qst002208_msg0024
rows.name:
So I'll try again. Next time, I'll
deliver my song fair and square.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0025
rows.name:
And I'll get both a wealthy
life and a rich song.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0026
rows.name:
And one day, I'll make everyone
acknowledge that I'm a better
singer than you, Mellica.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0027
rows.name:
Hehe, please be gentle
with me, Albina-san.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0028
rows.name:
Everyone, thank you so much
for your help this time.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0029
rows.name:
Yes, it became a big deal,
but I'm glad I could become
friends with Albina-san.

rows.label: qst002208_msg0030
rows.name:
This is for you. Please come and
listen to us sing sometime.
